roleset.name: depend, like a door on a hinge
roleset.note: HINGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hinge' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.4. (from hinge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Analysts say its chances of success will likely hinge on how well Trelleborg manages to cooperate with Noranda in the Falconbridge venture.
example.arg: on how well Trelleborg manages to cooperate with Noranda in the Falconbridge venture
